nodes.text: A rickshaw was a type of vehicle that consisted of a covered two-person repulsorlift chair attached to a pair of long poles that were pulled by an RIC-series general labor droid who provided the vehicle locomotion. Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala once rode in a rickshaw operated by the rickshaw droid RIC-920 when visiting Mos Espa, a port city located on the planet Tatooine.
